description: In accordance with §24-37.5-105(9), the office of the Chief Technology Officer (CTO)  has adopted  a Web Services standard to guide the creation and utilization of Web Services for use in all applicable State Applications. This Standard shall be titled “Web Services-2012v1”.

name: OIT Standards - Web Services 2012v1
